body.name: MCLEN Magic Silicone Broom, Windows, Tiles, Wood, Carpets, Pet Hair Remover, Squeegee Broom Floor Sweeper with Detachable Head, Household Cleaning Tool for Water, Dust, Glass 52"

features: MULTI-SURFACE CLEANING - Sturdy and flexible silicone squeegee sweeper can precisely grip debris to be cleaned on many indoor surface textures, including floors, windows, carpets, rugs, mirrors, tiles, hardwood etc.
MULTI-PURPOSE TOOL - Magic broom removes pet fur, dog hair and human hair. Scrape away dust, broken glass, spilled liquid, water, food waste, and any oozing messes.

PATENT ERGONOMIC DESIGN - Effectively decreases pressure and effort on the arm and wrist while sweeping the floor. The flat squeegee and sharp corners enable you to reach any narrow, small, or hard-to-reach area. Strong triangle structure design prevents deformation over time.

DURABLE AND LONG LASTING - No messy hair tangling, stuck debris problem. After using, rinse with water and reuse. A TPR squeegee head offers better flexibility and range of motion. Premium stainless steel poles are rarely broken or cracked during long-term use.
2 IN 1 FUNCTION- Detachable broom head can be used as a squeegee. A longer distance and wider area can be reached by adding more extension (sold separately).
SPACE SAVER – Fits in any storage space, small gaps, corners. Can also be hung on the wall.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - A must-have household cleaning tool for indoor cleaning. If you are not 100% satisfied with this product, we guarantee your money back.
body.description: Don't have time to vacuum? Not everyone has the time to vacuum their floors every day. Besides, using a big and bulky hoover can be a bit bothersome, especially if you only need to clean a small portion of the floor. That said, how do you keep your floors clean in between vacuuming schedules? This is where a broom comes in handy. But you don't want to use just any other broom. You want something that effectively sweeps away not just solid particles but also liquids. One that can double as a window cleaner would be a good option, too! Enjoy a convenient way of cleaning any type of dirt on most surfaces with the MCLEN Multifunction Squeegee Broom for Floor! This rubber broom and squeegee is perfect for cleaning up different types of dirt and debris. This includes spilled beverages, loose soil, broken glasses, as well as dust and pollen on windows. The silicone/TPE blade also creates static electricity as it goes over the surfaces being cleaned, making it more effective in picking up fine dust and hair. The long shaft and thin broom head allow you to clean hard-to-reach areas like underneath the couch or cornice. The head's sharp corners also allow you to effectively sweep the wall-floor joints. We also designed and crafted this broom for a long service life. The stainless steel pole stands well against rust, and the silicone/TPE head won't easily deform or become flimsy. The head also features a triangular design for enhanced durability. Still not sure? Here are more details about our rubber broom to help you decide: - Patent ergonomic design - Lightweight - Easy to clean - With a hanging hole at the handle - Elegant looks MOST IMPORTANTLY: You now can upgrade your broom by adding our branded extension pole. Depending on your needs, this broom can be any length. Get a broom that makes cleaning almost effortless. Add the MCLEN Multifunction Squeegee Broom for Floor to your cart TODAY!

productInformation.value: #61,948 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #43 in Household Push Brooms

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sweeps up dog hair likes no bodies business. Bought this for my labs hair. I have all hardwood floors. Can get into corners much better than a broom and the price is right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked better than expected
reviews.reviewText: This is a great tool to get under appliances where a thick broom wouldn’t normally reach. It also acts as a squeegee which is great for sweeping in wet areas, like a bathroom (or if you spill liquid on the ground).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's such a bad product! I seen something similar on TikTok. I should have bought from them instead. When I opened it I couldn't believe how small it was. The handle is flimsy but the rubber to "sweep" with is stiff & does not sweep. I tried using on my hardwood floors, bathroom linoleum & the bedroom rugs it doesn't work on any of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works until metal handle gives
reviews.reviewText: The metal screw together pole design is good in theory, but it's very flimsy, it's already broken after just over a month of use. Gladly, the end that sweeps works amazing. Not sure if I will just replace the pole handle or get a different broom entirely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been amazed at how this picks up pet hair and dust where traditional broom just seem to fling it in the air to land somewhere else. It is eye opening to think how much I was leaving behind before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not as easy to sweep
reviews.reviewText: Broom is too lightweight to push debris into a pile. Need to bear down at just the right pressure to sweep evenly or it will not pick up small crumbs. I will be returning mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Awesome for removing wet grime off carport! Very impressed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I can't connect handle to each other. Only fits broom handle and broom end. Connection of handle is not tapered. Impossible to screw together. Save your money.
